name: Johnny Bravo in The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!
name_original: Johnny Bravo in The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!
description: Play the part of Johnny Bravo and compete against rival studs over a number of events with the aim of winning a date with a hot chick on the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama TV show!
